name: essl

conflicts.name: +cuda
conflicts.description: ESSL+cuda+ilp64 cannot combine CUDA acceleration 64 bit integers

conflicts.name: +cuda
conflicts.description: ESSL+cuda threads=none cannot combine CUDA acceleration without multithreading support

description: IBM's Engineering and Scientific Subroutine Library (ESSL).

dependent_to.name: elemental
dependent_to.description:
Elemental: Distributed-memory dense and sparse-direct linear algebra and
optimization library.

dependent_to.name: hydrogen
dependent_to.description:
Hydrogen: Distributed-memory dense and sparse-direct linear algebra and
optimization library. Based on the Elemental library.

dependent_to.name: dihydrogen
dependent_to.description:
DiHydrogen is the second version of the Hydrogen fork of the well-known
distributed linear algebra library, Elemental. DiHydrogen aims to be a
basic distributed multilinear algebra interface with a particular
emphasis on the needs of the distributed machine learning effort, LBANN.

dependent_to.name: p3dfft3
dependent_to.description:
P3DFFT++ (a.k.a. P3DFFT v. 3) is a new generation of P3DFFT library that
aims to provide a comprehensive framework for simulating multiscale
phenomena. It takes the essence of P3DFFT further by creating an
extensible, modular structure uniquely adaptable to a greater range of
use cases.
